'''Sweet Shrimp Sushi''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Sweet Shrimp Sushi is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] at [[Shimura's]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Sweet Shrimp Sushi revives and restores '''50'''/'''100'''/'''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
